firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Chosen" reminder, show the "This character selected you" card, then the Whaler token. If the Demon doesn't kill a Minion tonight, a Minion dies immediately after the Demon acts.
name: Whaler
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately visit the Storyteller & choose a player. If you choose the Demon, that night the Demon learns this & a Minion dies.
flavor: Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee.

name: Provost
ability: The 1st time a player you nominate is executed, the day doesn't end.
flavor: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Nominated" reminder, they don't wake up tonight.
name: Mudlark
ability: The 1st time you nominate, if you nominate the Demon, they don't wake that night.
flavor: The mud will wash off but the memories will last forever.

otherNightReminder: If the Zealot died tonight and a Townsfolk is dead: a dead Townsfolk is now alive.
name: Zealot
ability: If you die at night, a dead Townsfolk is resurrected.

otherNightReminder: If the Clerk is marked with the "Executed" reminder, show the character token of the player that nominated them.
name: Clerk
ability: If you die by execution, that night you learn who nominated you.
flavor: There were some discrepancies in the financial statements.

name: Hoarder
ability: When you die, a Townsfolk loses their ability.
flavor: These are my things! I need them!

name: Leper
ability: If a player targets you with their ability, a good player might die, even if you are dead.
flavor: The worst disease is the feeling of being unwanted.

firstNightReminder: The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
name: Spork
ability: Each night, choose 1 or 2 players: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day. If you choose 2, the Demon might also be poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Where my spores fly, I do not decide; that is up to the wind.

otherNightReminder: If the Instigator is marked with the "Has executed" reminder, they point to a player. That player dies.
name: Instigator
ability: Each night*, if you successfully a nominate and execute someone, choose a player: they die.
flavor: Let's get it started in here.

otherNightReminder: The Poltergeist points to a player. That player dies.
name: Poltergeist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. All players know who you are. If any of your Minions live, you cannot die.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
